ch.aplu.android.nxt

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.android.nxt.Part
      • ch.aplu.android.nxt.Sensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    I2CSensor, LightSensor, SoundSensor, TouchSensor

    public abstract class Sensor
extends Part
    Abstract class as ancestor of all sensors.
